name: Broken (Unrealer)
description:
Just the first part of the Broken visual novel. Will definitely add more later! :)

Akemi wakes up after bring sick from taking the "Cure." Haven is worried about her and her decision.

Credits:

Main Background - HeHudojnik

Main Menu background - RomaintryStram

Main Menu Music - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=K_rWqUYruSc

Main Game Music - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PeQSCzrByo4

Game Editor - Ren.py

Guide:    

Click to move forward/Choose a choice

Press the back button to go back

Mouse scroll wheel to move back and forth

Esc to open Menu
